item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

Heres all The Code I Got For Dclaws. They Hit x4 But Dont Do ALL The Damage.
Example : I Might Hit 5-5-5-5 But It Only Lowers Their HP By 5 And Not 20.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13056 && specialAmount > 24){ specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068); DCdown = 4; DCDamg = true; getHit(8); usingSpecial = true; }

public boolean process() { if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamgNPC(30); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } } if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { if (DCdown == 2 ) { startAnimation(2068); } SpecDamg(25); DCdown -= 1; if (DCdown == 0 ) { DCDamg = false; } }

Read full topic
